The 2018 #FarmBill conference report will strengthen the farm safety net, incentivize work and make critical investments to support rural communities, farm families, and American consumers. Next stop ➡️president's desk. #NC07

The 2018 #FarmBill also makes more than 30 improvements to the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) while enabling additional immediate improvements to be made by the Trump Administration.  #NC07

In addition to enhancing crop insurance & other farm programs, the #FarmBill increases @USDA's capacity to combat the opioid crisis, expands quality broadband access, and makes significant investments in animal disease preparedness critically important to NC and the nation. #NC07

America’s farm families are facing a great deal of uncertainty, especially in eastern NC where #HurricaneFlorence dealt a devastating blow. I'm pleased that we were able to reach a #FarmBill agreement with the Senate that delivers a stronger safety net for our farm families #NC07

BREAKING – the House just passed the 2018 #FarmBill, sending it to #POTUS desk for signature. H.R. 2  sets us on a better path for rural communities, producers and consumers by enhancing the farm safety net and addressing the specific needs of rural America. #NC07
The 2018 #FarmBill agreement enhances the health & development of our rural communities by strengthening @USDA’s ability to combat the #opioidcrisis and expand access to quality broadband.  #NC07

The 2018 #FarmBill takes critical steps to prevent potential animal disease outbreaks by protecting our nation’s livestock and establishing an animal disease and preparedness response program through a U.S.-only vaccine bank.  #NC07 #gottobenc

America’s farm families are facing a great deal of uncertainty with a 51% drop in net farm income over the past 5 yrs. The 2018 #FarmBill provides our farmers, who work so hard to provide us with the safest, most affordable food supply, much-needed certainty & support. #NC07

Today, the House will consider the 2018 #FarmBill -- delivering on our promise to strengthen the farm safety net and make critical investments to support our rural communities, farm families, and consumers.  #NC07 #gottobenc

This week, I introduced the Veterans’ Credit Protection Act of 2019, which seeks to address the VA’s long history of delayed payments to outside service providers & help veterans prevent & resolve credit issues resulting from delayed payment by the @DeptVetAffairs.

There are many veterans across our country & #NC07 who have had their credit destroyed through no fault of their own because the @DeptVetAffairs paid their medical bills late, or not at all. No veteran should take a hit to their credit because of a delayed payment by the VA.
